pr_title: [ML] allow data streams to be expanded for analytics and transforms

timeline.message: [ML] allow datastreams to be expanded for analytics and transforms

timeline.bodyText:
makes me wonder, if we have a use case, where we do not want data streams, in this PR it seems not.
Except the unit tests: Do they fail for includeDatastreams=true?
If there is no good reason, I suggest to keep it simple and make data streams default.
timeline.author: hendrikmuhs

timeline.message: adding data stream integration tests to datafeeds transforms and analytics

timeline.bodyText: Could we move this to MlNativeIntegTestCase and then also reuse it in DatafeedJobsIT?
timeline.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.bodyText: I think it'd be nice to have a new test like you added in DatafeedJobsID. Having a test that explains it works on data streams in its name adds to the documentation of what those jobs should support. Also, if that test failed but all others worked fine, we'd immediately know it's because of data streams and not something else.
timeline.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.bodyText: Similarly here, I think we'd benefit from having a single dedicated test that tests data streams.
